title: Israel Targeted Top Iranian Leaders in Attack’s Opening Strikes
summary_full: At least one gathering of senior officials and military leaders was hit, but it was not immediately clear whether the effort to kill them had succeeded.
summary_public: At least one gathering of senior officials and military leaders was hit, but it was not immediately clear whether the effort to kill them had succeeded.

IL.label: negative
